TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug used in the treatment of metabolic acidosis (a disorder in which the blood is too acidic).

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento usado para el tratamiento de la acidosis metabólica (un trastorno en el que la sangre es excesivamente ácida).
